name: How many Deaths to Clear?
description:
"How many deaths to clear?" is a time attack game where players compete to clear the game as fast as possible while keeping track of the number of times they die.

Instructions for Controls

　・While holding down the left mouse button, pull the cursor in the opposite direction of where you want to jump to make a bigger jump.
　・A prediction line will appear showing the direction you will be launched in.
　・Time slows down while the mouse button is held down.



　・There is a limit to the number of times you can jump before you hit the ground and recover, so be careful not to waste your jumps.



　・Hitting a Flick Token that's been placed in the game will recover one jump.



Game Description

　・If you hit a spike or laser, you will be sent back to the save point.



・Also, by touching certain objects placed along the way, you can update the save point.



That's it for the instructions.
Try to clear the game as fast as possible without dying too much, and enjoy the thrilling sensation that comes with it.
